content.query:
-- IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
--                 FROM    sys.schemas
--                 WHERE   name = 'miPINS' )
--     EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [miPINS]');
-- GO


-- CREATE OR ALTER VIEW miPINS.vw_service_user
-- AS

SELECT TOP 100 

    SU.Salutation                                               AS salutation,
    SU.FirstName                                                AS firstName,
    SU.LastName                                                 AS lastName,
    SU.AddressLine1                                             AS addressLine1,
    SU.AddressLine2                                             AS addressLine2,
    SU.AddressTown                                              AS addressTown,
    SU.AddressCounty                                            AS addressCounty,
    SU.Postcode                                                 AS postcode,
    SU.Organisation                                             AS organisation,
    SU.OrganisationType                                         AS organisationType,
    ''                                                          AS organisationRole,
    SU.TelephoneNumber                                          AS telephoneNumber,
    SU.OtherPhoneNumber                                         AS otherPhoneNumber,
    SU.FaxNumber                                                AS faxNumber,
    SU.Role                                                     AS serviceUserType,
    SU.CaseReference                                            AS caseReference
    
FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[service_user_dim]               AS SU
WHERE SU.IsActive = 'Y'
ORDER BY SU.FirstName , SU.LastName DESC
